Package com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.messaging

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KafkaFactory
    a factory class to create consumers and producers which are required in gate and business handler
    MyPartitionAssigner
    represents the way which each partition should be assigned to a consumer.
    MyPartitioner
    represents the partitioner class to show Kafka to select which partition to choose for each request / response.
    MyRebalanceListener
    when a node is added, removed or closed, rebalancing partition assignments take place.
    RequestDeserializer
    custom deserializer for business handler- deserialize MyRequest objects
    RequestSerializer
    custom serializer for gate - serialize MyRequest objects
    ResponseDeserializer
    custom deserializer for gate- deserialize MyRequest objects
    ResponseSerializer
    custom serializer for business handler - serialize MyResponse objects
